title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: No one expects you to be perfect, even if you think they do. Ironically, admitting to a lapse in understanding is the first step in gaining an even greater understanding. Otherwise, you run the risk of steeping deeper in ignorance, which is a heavy price to pay for pride. The beaming Aries Moons embrace with wounded Chiron suggests that you have a lot to learn from keeping an open mind, especially if you recently misspoke or made a social gaffe. Perhaps its hardest to forgive yourself today. But if you can clear this emotional hurdle, youre bound to reconnect to your inner tank of joy. Compassion starts within. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
